Exaggerate: The claim states that Joe Biden incorrectly stated that there were 6,114 "military COVID deaths" and 118,984 "military COVID infections," while the actual number of military deaths was seven. This indicates an exaggeration of the numbers.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there were only seven military deaths from COVID-19, while Joe Biden stated a much higher number.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence or sources to support the statement that Joe Biden made an incorrect statement about the number of military COVID deaths and infections.
